about_the_game:
Shape your civilization’s destiny in this epic turn-based strategy game. Manage resources, advance technology, and conquer through the ages. Every choice transforms history—will your empire rise to greatness or fall to obscurity?

Key Features:

Dynamic Historical Progression

Start from ancient times and guide your people through key historical epochs—medieval, industrial, and modern. Your civilization’s future is shaped by your choices.

Character Customization

Design your leader with complete control over their appearance. Customize facial features, skin tone, and age to create a unique character that reflects your vision for your civilization's ruler. Express your creativity and make your mark with a distinctive protagonist.

Turn-Based and Real-Time Battles

Seamlessly switch between turn-based strategy and real-time action. Plan your conquests carefully, or dive into the heat of battle for fast-paced tactical gameplay.

Third-Person Unit Control: Take full control of your units in third-person mode. Lead them directly into battle, using special abilities and split-second decisions to turn the tide of war.

Immersive Combat: Experience the thrill of large-scale warfare, from ancient warriors to modern soldiers. Command diverse armies on both land and sea, each with unique abilities that bring epic battles to life.

Advanced Diplomacy

Forge alliances, negotiate treaties, and manipulate international relations. Your diplomatic skills will determine the stability and success of your empire.

Research and Technology

Unlock new units, technologies, and advancements to strengthen your civilization’s military, economy, and cultural influence.

Dynamic Campaigns

Every decision impacts the course of history. Engage in branching campaigns where your choices create a unique and ever-evolving story.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features violent content and some gore.

Key Features:

Dynamic Historical Progression

Start from ancient times and guide your people through key historical epochs—medieval, industrial, and modern. Your civilization’s future is shaped by your choices.

Design your leader with complete control over their appearance. Customize facial features, skin tone, and age to create a unique character that reflects your vision for your civilization's ruler. Express your creativity and make your mark with a distinctive protagonist.

Turn-Based and Real-Time Battles

Seamlessly switch between turn-based strategy and real-time action. Plan your conquests carefully, or dive into the heat of battle for fast-paced tactical gameplay.

Third-Person Unit Control: Take full control of your units in third-person mode. Lead them directly into battle, using special abilities and split-second decisions to turn the tide of war.

Immersive Combat: Experience the thrill of large-scale warfare, from ancient warriors to modern soldiers. Command diverse armies on both land and sea, each with unique abilities that bring epic battles to life.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 (64bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan: AMD (21.11.3+) and NVIDIA (515.48+)
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Latest MacOS Monterey
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal 1.2 Compatible Graphics Card

name: EraTurn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7x64 / Windows 8.1x64 / Windows 10x64 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB & GTX 1050 TI or equivalent performance
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7x64 / Windows 8.1x64 / Windows 10x64 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 8th-gen or AMD Ryzen desktop processor with 8 cores @ 3GHz or equivalent performance
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB & RTX 3060 or equivalent performance
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device

short_description: Shape your civilization’s destiny in this epic turn-based strategy game. Manage resources, advance technology, and conquer through the ages. Every choice transforms history—will your empire rise to greatness or fall to obscurity?
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
